'''Storytelling Method''' ''(unofficial name)'' is a [[Quest Domain]] during {{Quest|Storytelling Method}}. 

==Walkthrough==
# Perform a Plunging Attack on the broken ground below the ladder
# Move through the room with two Nobushi and go up the stairs into the next room
# Path 1:
## Perform a Plunging Attack on the broken ground
## Move through the room with three Nobushi and go up the elevator
# Path 2:
## Drop a ladder by activating a switch on the right side of the room and climb the ladder
## Drop another ladder by activating a switch to the left and climb the ladder
# Investigate the spot near a tree in the sand

==Chests==
* Precious Chest &times;3
** None of these chests provide any rewards when opened.

==Enemies==
None of the enemies have to be defeated to progress the domain.
* Group 1 {{Enemy List|Nobushi: Jintouban*2}}
* Group 2 {{Enemy List|Nobushi: Hitsukeban*2}}
* Group 3 {{Enemy List|Nobushi: Hitsukeban*3}}
** An {{Electro}} [[Elemental Node]] that can be shut down buffs these enemies
* Group 4 {{Enemy List|Nobushi: Hitsukeban*2;Kairagi: Fiery Might}}
